headline: Lam’s New CEA-Leti R&D Pact and Dividend Hike Could Be A Game Changer For Lam Research (LRCX)
summary: In early February 2026, Lam Research’s board declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.26 per share and announced board and executive leadership changes, while also entering a new multi-year R&D partnership with CEA-Leti to work on specialty semiconductor technologies spanning MEMS, 3D imaging, sensors, RF, photonics, and quantum optics. Together, these moves signal Lam’s intent to pair ongoing cash returns to shareholders with deeper technology collaboration in areas increasingly linked to AI...

Together, these moves signal Lam’s intent to pair ongoing cash returns to shareholders with deeper technology collaboration in areas increasingly linked to AI...
